issue.title: Controlling Pan Tilt Gimbal using JointControlPlugin and JointStatePublisher

content.raw:
There are a number of `examples` available in the `ignition gazebo` sources: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/examples/worlds/.

Take a look at the [joint_controller.sdf](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/examples/worlds/joint_controller.sdf) for an example that uses the `JointController` plugin.

[lift_drag.sdf](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/examples/worlds/lift_drag.sdf) uses the `JointStatePublisher` plugin.
content.html:
There are a number of examples available in the ignition gazebo sources: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/examples/worlds/.

Take a look at the joint_controller.sdf for an example that uses the JointController plugin.

lift_drag.sdf uses the JointStatePublisher plugin.
